agreeConditions: By signing up, I agree to Centime <1>privacy policy</1> and <3>terms of service</3>
checkInviteMail: A New Invite has been sent. Please check your email
ContactMe: Would you like to have someone contact you for help ?
WillContactYou: Thanks. Someone will be in touch with you.

ClickOnLink: Please click on the link provided in your email to verify your account.
DidNotGetEmail: Did not get a verification email ?
NotYetVerified: You are not yet verified your account, trouble with the link in the email ?

ReceiveResetLink: Enter your email id, If there is such an account, you will receive a reset password link.
